item.title: Tesla Wants To Shift Away From China-Made Components For US Cars: Report
item.description: Tesla requires suppliers to exclude Chinese parts for US car production. Despite challenges, aim to switch all parts within 1-2 years. read more

item.title: Trump's Bond Buying Spree Surges Past $82 Million Since August
item.description: Trump bought over $82 million in bonds, intersecting with sectors boosted by his policies. Disclosures show 175+ transactions. read more

item.title: Sony Pictures Developing Labubu Doll Movie As Pop Mart Character Generates $670 Million In Revenue: Report
item.description: A Labubu movie is in early development at Sony as Pop Mart's collectible dolls continue to drive strong sales and visibility. read more

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Reports Safety Threats Amid Escalating Feud With Trump
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene says she's receiving safety warnings from private security firms after President Trump's recent public attacks. read more

item.title: Amherst CEO Sean Dobson Warns Pandemic Policies Made Homeownership Unaffordable For An Entire Generation
item.description: CEO warns pandemic policies have pushed housing costs to historic highs, leaving many unable to afford homes. Mortgage plan sparks backlash. read more
